}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141852220024J R01 RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device uses two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/201849A.pdf '''Skyworks''' SKY85803 Dual-Band FEMs].
[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2013/31991-buffalo-ces-2013-announcements Buffalo CES 2013 announcements - on SmallNetBuilder] :Expected to ship early 2013, ''street price'' of $69
Per '''Buffalo''''s (~ 310 MB) driver archive... *The '''Broadcom'''' driver is the following version in each of the OS specific directories... **6.30.61.28 (dated 11/06/2012) in the '''XP''' directory **6.30.61.25 (dated 10/29/2012) in the '''7''' directory **6.30.145.9 (dated 11/16/2012) in the '''8''' directory *The USB ID for this device is 0411:022a. *The driver cites the following additional USB IDs... **0411:0222 - noted as the WI-U2-400D **0a5c:bd1d - presumably the default BCM43526 USB ID, likely used by the [[Tenda W900U]]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery caption="from Buffalo"> Image:WI-U2-866D_front.jpg|front Image:WI-U2-866D_angled_top.jpg|angled, top view Image:WI-U2-866D_side_SA_usb.jpg|USB (RA) side view Image:WI-U2-866D_side_usb_angles.jpg|USB connector angles Image:WI-U2-866D_side_RA_laptop.jpg|with laptop </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
